articles.title: Weather alert issued for heavy rainfall above 150mm
articles.description: The Department of Meteorology has issued a Color- Red warning for heavy rainfall in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in Galle and Matara districts, in the next 24 hours. MORE..

articles.title: Another town in Haiti comes under attack a week after gangs killed at least 115 people
articles.description: Gunmen invaded another town north of Haiti s capital on Thursday, shooting at people and setting homes on fire, just a week after a massacre killed at least 115 people in the country s central region. The number of casualties was not immediately known. MORE..

articles.title: Court restrains Hasalaka Thushara from making defamatory statements on TV Derana
articles.description: The Colombo District Court issued an interim injunction against Hasalaka Thushara preventing him from issuing defamatory statements against TV Derana, until the final determination of the case. MORE..

articles.title: South Korea s Han Kang wins 2024 Nobel literature prize
articles.description: South Korean author Han Kang won the 2024 Nobel Prize in Literature for “her intense poetic prose that confronts historical traumas and exposes the fragility of human life,” the award-giving body said on Thursday. MORE..

articles.title: More than 3 million without power as Hurricane Milton slams Florida, causes deaths and flooding
articles.description: Hurricane Milton churned across Florida on Thursday after plowing into the state as a Category 3 storm, bringing misery to a coast still ravaged by Helene, pounding cities with winds of over 100 mph (160 kph) after producing a barrage of tornadoes, but sparing Tampa a direct hit. MORE..
